1.1.0.name: wordpress/mailer
1.1.0.description:
Mailer intercepts emails sent from your blog, stores them on disk and delivers them slowly to never hit the provider limits and risk a ban.

Mailer is compatible with WordPress and every plugin that use the wp_mail() function.

Some features:

  • configurable delivering speed
  • alternative sender email and name settings
  • SMTP ready
  • email grouping (extension for 3rd party plugins)
  • email priority (extension for 3rd party plugins)

Offial page: Mailer.
